text: (napiye!) Umatu uraivittum um'mai velippatuttiya ivarkalaivita ettanaiyo urarkal mikka palacalikalaka iruntanar. (Avarkal ceyta aniyayattin karanamaka) avarkal anaivaraiyum nam alittu vittom. (Accamayam) avarkalukku utavi ceypavarkal oruvarum irukkavillai. (Akave, ivarkal em'mattiram! Ivarkalaiyum nam alitte tiruvom)
